name: Hook (1991)
description: In this exciting Game Boy version of Hook you become Peter Pan and return to Neverland to free your children from the evil Captain Hook. You'll travel through mysterious forests, caves, lagoons and icy regions and confront enemies ranging from pirates and ghosts to the abominable snowman and hanging snake. Armed with a wooden sword, magic marbles and pixie dust, your challenge is to outwit, escape or defeat them all. And you must develop your skills at every stage of your journey for the final sword fight with Hook. The fight that will either win back... or lose your children forever.
